message: This is a fair start, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a good chunk of the money, but I'm also looking out for myself.  Let's see if you want to accept or try for more.
Alice, that was a pretty lopsided offer. Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split.  Take it or leave it, the value for both of us decreases with each round.

Okay, Bob, I understand you want a bigger share. This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you more, but I also need to make sure I get a fair cut.  Let's end this before the money loses even more value.
